citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The IACUC review of the facility’s program for humane care and use of animals is not occurring at the required frequency
of every six months. IACUC records reviewed during this inspection indicate that the last IACUC semi-annual review of
the facility’s program for the care and use of animals occurred on 08/15/2023 with no other reviews taking place since this
date. Regular reviews are necessary to ensure IACUC oversight of the program and to ensure the welfare of the animals
being used in research by the facility. The IACUC must review the facility's program for humane care and use of animals
at least once every six months.
Correct from this day, 11/26/2024, forward.

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The IACUC has not been conducting facility inspections at least once every six months as required. IACUC records
reviewed during this inspection indicate that the last IACUC semi-annual inspection of animal facilities occurred on
08/15/2023 with no other inspections taking place since this date. Animal facility inspections by the IACUC ensures
optimal animal welfare by identifying, prioritizing, and making plans for correcting areas which may be harmful to the
health and well-being of the animals. The IACUC must inspect, at least once every six months, all the facility's animal use
areas including housing and study areas.
Correct from this day,11/26/2024, forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
